title: Episode 173 w/ Jeezy
itunes:title: Episode 173 w/ Jeezy
description:
N.O.R.E & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. On this episode we welcome Drink Champs alumni, Jeezy! Back for the 2nd time, the champs chop it up with Jeezy about owning his masters, his evolution as a businessman, the origins of the group Boyz N Da Hood and the story of how he signed to Def Jam and much much more!
